page.title: 01Cinque Ports Connection
page.content: Every year in June the{Mayor of {Sandwich}comes to visit Brightlingsea.He used to come to make sure that the{Deputy}was doing his job well but now it's just to keep up the tradition. When Brightlingsea and the {Cinque Ports}became friends,the Mayor of Sandwich decided to come down and elect a head man (who they now call the Deputy),who would look after the town and things.When the Mayor of Sandwich came down there wasn't a Mayor of Brightlingsea.The reason the Mayor of Sandwich did this was because then his men would have somewhere to land when it was rough at sea. When the Sandwich fishermen were caught in a storm they used to come to Brightlingsea for shelter and to mend their nets and boats.Every time they came they had a nice welcome so they became friends.
